name: Raccoon Gang
tagline: Open edX development and E-Learning development
description:
Raccoon Gang consists of highly motivated professionals who are keen in modern technologies and practices and constantly trying improving them from day to day, from project to project. Our company specializes in building Open EdX ecosystems, custom web development and technological R&D’s.
Strong R&D background (PhD in Physics, Mathematics and Computer Science) gives us an opportunity to provide R&D and all kinds of analytics. We are obsessed with science and Big Data! 
We love E-learning and cutting-edge front end technologies. Our team can define the best solution that addresses clients business needs and implement it using proven Python/JS technologies.
